title: Business Analyst-Manufacturing
description:
Business Analyst - Manufacturing

Job Description

As a Business Intelligence Analyst, you will play a pivotal role in analyzing business processes, identifying areas for improvement, and providing data-driven insights to support strategic decision-making. Working closely with cross-functional teams, you will understand business requirements, streamline operations, and contribute to organizational growth. The ideal candidate will possess a strong analytical mindset, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of delivering actionable recommendations in a manufacturing setting.

Qualifications


Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or Statistics.
Minimum 5 years of experience as a Business Analyst.


Skills And Specialization


Demonstrated experience as a Business Analyst in the manufacturing sector, particularly in the Indian market.
Proficiency in analyzing complex data sets using tools such as Excel, SQL, and statistical software.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present findings and recommendations effectively.
Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment and manage multiple priorities. Responsibilities:
Gather and analyze data from various sources to generate insights and develop actionable recommendations.
Monitor and evaluate key performance indicators (KPIs) to track manufacturing performance and identify improvement opportunities.
Collaborate with stakeholders across departments to understand business needs and translate them into clear requirements.
Develop and maintain dashboards, reports, and performance metrics to track key business KPIs.
Assist in the implementation of new systems, tools, and processes to enhance operational efficiency and productivity.
Provide management with reports stating trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data.
Participate in cross-functional projects and initiatives to drive continuous improvement and innovation.


Please Read the JD Carefully if it matches with your skill sets then apply.

Regards

Gurpreet Kaur
